cause.description:
I am once again participating in the Central Ohio Heart Walk on August 18th starting @ COSI in Columbus, OH.
This year I am not just a walker/runner; I am a team captain of 1 of 4 teams sponsored by CB Richard Ellis! WOOHOO! And I'm once again "Doubling my Pace to Double my Donations!"
Please donate to anyone participating in this event but if you would like to donate to me or CBRE please go here --> http://centralohheartwalk.kintera.org/faf/r.asp?t=4&i=211263&u=211263-140298601
1. Fight Heart Disease
2. Fight Stroke
3. Create Awareness
cause.mission: Raise money on behalf of CB Richard Ellis for the American Heart Association
cause.name: 2007 Central Ohio American Heart Walk
